costingInitial.PartType: Choose Part Type, once you select technology you will be able to choose part type.
costingInitial.Part: Select Part no./Assembly no. here. Currently disabled; it will be enabled after selecting the Technology.
costingInitial.clear: Clear selected data here if incorrect.

costingSummary.downloadExcel: Click here to download the entire data in Excel format. Alternatively, select specific checkboxes to download only the chosen data in Excel format.
costingSummary.costingDetailedPdf: Download the detailed costing in PDF format, it will be in tabular form.
costingSummary.costingDownloadPdf: Download the costing as PDF from here.
costingSummary.sendForApproval: Costing can be sent for approval only if the costing status is in draft.
costingSummary.addToComparison: Compare this costing to other costings and Add the Vendor, Plant, and Costing version from the drawer.
costingSummary.viewBOM: View the BOM data from here.
costingSummary.edit: By clicking here, you can Edit this costing again.
costingSummary.view: View the whole data in form.
costingSummary.add: Click here to create a New Costing and start the process.
costingSummary.discard: Discard the costings you've compared from here.
costingSummary.changeVersion: Change the costing version and edit the costing from here.
costingSummary.viewPieChart: View the pie chart from here.
costingSummary.viewRMCost: View detailed Raw Material Cost from here.
costingSummary.viewMultipleTechnology: View detailed Multiple Technology Cost from here.
costingSummary.viewBOPCost: View the detailed BOP from here.
costingSummary.viewConversionCost: View detailed conversion cost data here.
costingSummary.viewSurfaceTreatmentCost: View detailed surface treatment cost data here.
costingSummary.viewOverheadProfitCost: View detailed overhead, profit, ICC, and rejection data here.
costingSummary.viewPackagingFreightCost: View detailed packaging, freight and rejection data here.
costingSummary.viewToolCost: View detailed tool cost data here.
costingSummary.viewOtherCost: View detailed Quoted Cost from here.
costingSummary.costingNotDone: Costing for this part/assembly has not yet been done. Please select another part.

costingStepTwo.ncc: Add New Component Costing from here.

vendorCreateCosting.version: Here you can see all the version of created costings.
vendorCreateCosting.createCosting: Click here to create new costing version.
vendorCreateCosting.deleteCosting: Delete this costing version from here.
vendorCreateCosting.copyCosting: Copy this costing version from here.
vendorCreateCosting.discard: Remove the added data from here.

costingTabs.effectiveDate: Choose the effective date before the create costing
costingTabs.RMC_tabs: You can add your all RMC Cost in below tab.
costingTabs.Surface_Treatment_tabs: You can add your Surface Treatment Cost in below tab.
costingTabs.Overheads_Profits_tabs: You can add your Overhead & Profit Cost in below tab.
costingTabs.Packaging_Freight_tabs: You can add your Packaging & Freight Cost in below tab.
costingTabs.Tool_tabs: You can add your Tool Cost in below tab.
costingTabs.Discount_Other_tabs: You can add your Discount & Other Cost in below tab.

Hints.partHint: Click on the arrow for creating and view RMC data
Hints.overheadHint: Click on the arrow for adding and view Overhead & Profit data
Hints.surfaceTreamentButton: Click on the button, for adding Surface Treatment

RMCtabs.AddRM: Here you can add your Raw Materials
RMCtabs.AddBOP: Here you can add your BOPs
RMCtabs.AddProcess: Here you can add your Processes
RMCtabs.AddOperation: Here you can add your Operations
RMCtabs.AddOtherOperation: Here you can add your Other Operation
RMCtabs.AddBOPHandlingCharge: Here you can add your BOP Handling Charge
RMCtabs.EditAssemblyCosting: You can edit the Assembly costing.
RMCtabs.AssemblyAddOperation: Add operation for assembly here, and the same applies to sub-assembly as well.
RMCtabs.PartLocked: Child parts costing are coming from individual costing, please edit there if want to change costing.

addSTCost.addSt: Add a surface by clicking this button.

OverheadProfitTab.checkBox1: If you want to include Surface Treatment Cost in CC for Overhead and Profit, click on the checkbox.
OverheadProfitTab.checkBox2: If you want to include Surface Treatment Cost in CC for Rejection, click on the checkbox.
OverheadProfitTab.checkBox3: If you want to include Tool cost in CC for Overhead and Profit, click on the checkbox.
OverheadProfitTab.checkBox4: If you want to include Overhead & Profit in ICC, click on the checkbox.
OverheadProfitTab.modelType: Select the model type. Based on the model type, you will see the overhead and profit data below the table.
OverheadProfitTab.iccCost: If you wish to add ICC cost, please click the button.
OverheadProfitTab.paymentTermCost: To add Payment Term cost, click the button to reveal the input fields.
OverheadProfitTab.refreshButton: After filling all the data, please refresh to update the cost.
OverheadProfitTab.overheadCost: You can see the total cost here.
OverheadProfitTab.saveOverheadCost: After filling and verifying the data.

ToolTab.switch: You can swtich the process from here.

DiscountTab.discountRemark: ERMC_tabsnter the Descount descriptions or remark
DiscountTab.discountTypePercentage: If you choose applicability other than 'Fixed',t his field will be enabled; otherwise, it will remain disabled.
DiscountTab.discountTypeFixed: If you choose applicability'Fixed', this field will be enabled; otherwise, it will remain disabled.
DiscountTab.otherCost: You can add other costs from here; clicking on it will open a drawer.
DiscountTab.conditionCost: You can add condition cost from here; clicking on it will open a drawer.
DiscountTab.refreshData: After the added other cost and condition cost from drawers, please refresh to see the updated total cost.
DiscountTab.changeCurrency: Clicking on the checkbox, you will see the two field one is currency change dropdown and other one is converted cost.
DiscountTab.saveData: Please save the data before leave the section.
DiscountTab.nextData: From here, you will go to summary drawer and data will save.

RawMaterialCost.calculator: Add finish weight and gross weight using this calculator.
RawMaterialCost.delete: You can delete the RM from here.
RawMaterialCost.remark: You can add remarks or note here.

BopCost.edit: You can edit the BOP from here.
BopCost.delete: You can delete the BOP from here.
BopCost.bopHandling: You can add your BOP handling charge from here.

processCost.calculator: You can fill data from calculator for process cost.
processCost.delete: You can delete the process from here.
processCost.remark: You can add remarks or notes from here.S

operationCost.edit: You can edit the operation from here.
operationCost.delete: You can delete the operation from here.
operationCost.remark: You can add remarks or notes from here.

BopCostHandlingCharge.cancel: Click here to reset the form and go back to the page.

AddAssemblyOperation.cancel: Click here to reset the form and go back to the page.

AddAssemblyProcess.cancel: Click here to reset the form and go back to the page.

AddSurfaceTreatment.cancel: Click here to reset the form and go back to the page.

AddPackaging.cancel: Click here to reset the form and go back to the page.

AddFreight.cancel: Click here to reset the form and go back to the page.

CostingComparison.vendor_code: Select the vendor code from the dropdown.
CostingComparison.plant_code: Select the plant code from the dropdown.
CostingComparison.cancel: Click here to reset the form and go back to the page.

costingApproval.searchInput: Search for specific data from here.
costingApproval.filterButton: After entering specific data, click here to filter it out.
costingApproval.refreshButton: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.
costingApproval.floating_FilterInput: Here you can search for specific column-wise data.
costingApproval.floating_FilterButton: Here you can filter the data based on different conditions.
costingApproval.checkBoxButton: Click on the checkbox to select a particular row.
costingApproval.costing_Detailed: Click on the costing number to view detailed costing from here.
costingApproval.approval_Summary: Click on the approval number to view approval summary from here.
costingApproval.sendForApproval: After selecting the checkbox, you can send it for approval.
costingApproval.status: You can filter the costing by status from here.
